name: BERT Topic Modeling
description: Finds and assigns topics in a batch of texts using BERT embeddings.

input column.description: When using CSV, defines the column to use this operation on. Defaults to 'text'

output columns prefix.description: The prefix to add to the output columns ('id' and 'words'). Defaults to 'topic_'

topic modeling.description: Configuration for topic modeling using BERTopic.

language.description: The language used for BERTopic embeddings.

min_cluster_size.description: The minimum size of topic clusters.

vectorizer.description: Optional configuration for CountVectorizer used in BERTopic.

max_df.description: Ignore terms with document frequency (%) higher than this.

min_df.description: Ignore terms with document frequency lower than this, measured in the number of documents.

Use verbose progress reporting.description: If checked, the progress of the topic modeling process will be reported in the console. Care! This will have severe impact on performance as embeddings will be calculated manually.
